name: cms125v14_breast_cancer_screening
description: CMS125v14 Breast Cancer Screening - Clinical Quality Measure for women 42-74 years of age who had a mammogram

protocols.description: Breast Cancer Screening protocol - CMS125v14 Clinical Quality Measure

meta.title: Breast Cancer Screening
meta.description: Women 42-74 years of age who have not had a mammogram to screen for breast cancer within the last 27 months.
references: American Cancer Society. (2017). Breast Cancer Facts & Figures 2017-2018. Retrieved February 8, 2019, from https://www.cancer.org/content/dam/cancer-org/research/cancer-facts-and-statistics/breast-cancer-facts-and-figures/breast-cancer-facts-and-figures-2017-2018.pdf
